metadata.description: Shin Baredo, a delusional "MADMAN" arrived in Tomido Citadel to find a job but got chased by the Brokers instead. He was saved by Suisui, a terrorized female MADMAN, and her family. Would his employment as a MADMEN recruiter under Link Toy Family lead him to the better life an "insane" man can have? Or would reality betray him once again?
metadata.name: MADMEN
